Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: pathchk

Arguments.Name: p
Arguments.Description: Perform portability checks on the specified pathname arguments, writes messages if 1) path is longer than _POSIX_PATH_MAX (255) bytes 2) contains a component longer than _POSIX_NAME_MAX (14) bytes, contains any character not in the portable filename character set

Arguments.Name: P
Arguments.Description: In addition to the default or -p checks, write a diagnostic for each argument that 1) is empty 2) contains a component that starts with a hyphen
